reviewText: This is the worst dvd I have ever purchased. It's not a flowing routine, it is done in short clips. I really dislike this dvd. I can't see myself  ever watching it again. It was a total waste of money.  Off to goodwill it goes.
This DVD is fantastic, Victoria has a gentle voice with very clear instructions which are easy to follow. The exercises are extremely effective and have great results! Thank you Victoria!

This DVD takes you carefully through all the basic exercises and this makes it perfect for use at home when you can't make it to a class.

I go to Victoria's classes in England, and it is great to hear her calm voice on the DVD!
